pages.fallback: Vibro allows players to leap high and create deadly shockwaves based on fall damage.

The Vibro Shamir is found on Thorium Bands. It can be placed onto boots.

When sneaking, players who take fall damage will hurt mobs within a 6 block radius. Damage is based on distance from the player and the type of blocks between.

Sneaking on the ground will allow the player to gain temporary jump boost. The level of jump boost is dependent on the sneak time.

When using the Vibro Jump, the player will take damage when landing.
